attributes.action: Provide more support & financial help for people living with dementia
attributes.background: Provide more backing.  Denentia is the UK's biggest killer yet cancer & BHF receive more funding

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/615321

If you want the Government to increase funding for research into dementia, we could accept a petition requesting that.
